pass: Well done, your code passed all the tests! You could now see if you can tidy up the code to make it more efficient.
fail: Your code failed some tests, this means that there is an issue with how you have implemented it.
exceptions: During the execution of your code exceptions have occured

exceptions.division by zero: Somewhere in your code you've tried to divide by zero. Check if you're dividing with a variable, if its value can be set to zero.
